StoryText: I'm home alone and watching TV and I fall asleep.
Question: When I wake up the channel has been changed to the History channel. What do I do?

OptionText.Text: Change the channel back to my channel.

OptionResult.Result: I change the channel back, and then it changes back to the History channel again. And I get the feeling I am not alone.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: After the channel changes back on its own, I notice I can feel someone or something sitting beside me on the couch. Though I look and no one is there. I don't change the channel, I leave it. I watch an entire program on the History channel and then once it's done the TV turns off. And then I cannot sleep at all that night and am so sleep deprived the next day.

OptionResult.Result: I turn the TV off and it immediately EXPLODES!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Okay, I am fairly certain I was not alone. There was some supernatural or paranormal stuff happening. For the channel to be changing and then for the TV to explode because I turned it off... someone or something was there and didn't like what I was doing. That was a horrible feeling. Not to mention, I have to buy a new TV now!

OptionResult.Result: I go back to sleep on the couch but I wake up hours later and all the windows have been opened and I get sick.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: This was the weirdest experience. I thought maybe the TV channels changing was in my head but then after I went to sleep and all the windows were opened... and I know I had closed them before... that really makes me wonder. Maybe I wasn't truly alone that night. But right now I am so sick I just need to focus on getting better.
